# Shell Scripting

This repository contains a collection of shell scripts and related resources.

## Purpose

The goal of this project is to:
- Practice and demonstrate shell scripting techniques.
- Automate common tasks.
- Store useful snippets and utilities.

## Usage

Scripts in this repository can be executed from the command line. Make sure to grant execution permissions if necessary:

```bash
chmod +x analyze-logs.sh
./analyze-logs.sh
```
